website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to pay the premium price, TiVo's do-it-all Roamio is the best cable DVR yet and an able whole-home TV solution.
pros: The TiVo Roamio Pro is the company's most powerful DVR to date with six tuners
a healthy selection of streaming video, music, and photo services
the capability to stream and download to iOS devices
and easy expansion to other rooms with TiVo Mini extenders
cons: Cable cutters and satellite subscribers will be disappointed that the Roamio Plus and Pro work with digital cable and Verizon Fios only
Only viewers in select Comcast markets can access their provider's pay-per-view or VOD content
The price is steep: $600 plus $15 a month (or $500 for lifetime service)
While there are plenty of available streaming options, key services like Amazon Prime and HBO Go are still missing

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a used Tivo, I am still enjoying all of the features that this particular model has. I had a newer model and sent it back. Not user friendly at all. Didn't even have as many features as my Tivo. This particular model is wonderful. Lots of space, The ability to record six different programs at one time. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Mackay

customer_reviews.title: The system does not update current available disk space after deleting recordings.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a TiVo Roamio Pro for several years. Over the years I have taken the time to permanently delete large numbers of recordings. The disk space usage meter has never shown a reduction in disk space used. Since my disk space used now shows at over 85%, I contacted TiVo to learn how to reset the meter. The response was there is currently no way to reset the used space meter. So at this point I can only hope there is enough space available when I set up new recordings. I do not recommend this product or any TiVo recording product that does not show current space used or preferably currecnt space available for use or both.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Game Plan Change!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new Tivo...All excited until I found out in the activation process that Tivo NOW charges $149.99 for the first year's service...This, until now, had been included with each new Tivo...Now that it has changed, it has, in effect, increased the price by $149.99...Heck, I don't even know if the new box is gonna work!!! Even though you can select a month-to-month option, it requires a commitment for the full year. Helluva good start, Tivo!!
customer_reviews.author: FOB3

customer_reviews.title: More features than your cable DVR
customer_reviews.text: The huge upfront cost almost drove me away. The price of the Roamio and the lifetime subscription is too much in my opinion. But if you do the math you'll see that in 3 to 4 years that pays for itself and you can still sell the device to help buy a new one. Being able to record 6 shows at once is great and streaming to iOS is almost perfect and I'm sure it will get there. The Roamio is also quieter and cooler than my previous fios dvr and that's good. I wish the remote had a stop button, it's hard getting used to hitting left arrow or tivo central or even live TV to stop a show.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Soares

customer_reviews.title: The Roamio Pro is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Roamio Pro! It does everything I want in a DVR! It's so much better than anything the cable company has to offer! The six tuners mean I never have to worry about conflicts, and the TiVo suggestions are pretty decent. Unfortunately, I can't say the same thing about the TiVo Mini. I've had three of them in a month because the first two crapped out on me. So far the third is working well, but time will tell. Amazon has been great with the returns & exchanges! Now if I can just get TiVo to issue me the correct credit for the service on the defective units.....
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: Best Tivo Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've been with TIVO since 2003; I just retired a 2007 Tivo that has run non-stop for 8+ years and replaced it with the Roamio Pro; the Roamio Pro with it's built in streaming capability and MOCA networking and One Pass capability is quite evolutionary for Tivo; built quality is excellent and the Netflix and Amazon Instant Video interfaces are the best ever for a Tivo box; in short, an excellent but a bit pricey product...Amazon did a great job getting it to me and their packaging was also excellent
customer_reviews.author: John in LV

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal in the long term
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my 12-year old series 2 Tivo had power supply problems (since fixed). Plugged a few of my season passes in and it was off, recording them and scads of movies (some of which I've marked to hold until I get to them). A bit pricey once you add service to the purchase price, but at the time I didn't have time to assemble a "Myth TV" system ([...]). Still had to keep my original cable box, to do things like on-demand.
customer_reviews.author: F. Korz

customer_reviews.title: Love. Brilliant update to Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Love. Brilliant update to Tivo. RF remote is awesome. 4-24-2015 - paired this with a TiVo Mini and a slide remote, and Hot Damn, this is a great machibe to run the entire house! (We have 6+ TVs). No regrets getting the "pro" model. At the moment, there's over 600 Tivo suggested shows on it, and I've barely cracked 13% capacity. And it's got Netflix, Hulu and Amazon baked in! If you're hesitating, don't. This from a guy that has owned 4 previous tivo boxes. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Windle

customer_reviews.title: Recording 6 channels at once is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After coming from a 5 tuner satellite DVR I was a little disappointed at the DVR that Charter Cable had. After getting the Tivo Roamio I love having cable now. I can record more channels at once than I could with satellite plus I have more HD channels with Cable. I took a few calls to get the cable card working correctly with Charter but had no problems after the first night with either the cable card or the tuning adapter. I've had everything running a month now and I still love it. I have no regrets with this purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: chadsc

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is the manufacturer's continued failure to expand ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the manufacturer's continued failure to expand HDD storage beyond a paltry TB with external drive. At one point I had almost 8 TBs of Amazon Unbox files downloaded on my computer. The unfortunate option of using third party expansion kits to expand storage and then losing your warranty is unsatisfactory. The manufacturer needs to buy-out or contract with one of these suppliers and offer upgrades through their support network.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without my TIVO. It's my favorite tech product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a TIVO owner since the invention of TIVO. I am on my 4th TIVO, I currently have the Roamio Pro and the Mini. I LOVE my TIVO's, they make watching TV exciting again because I can record all types of exciting shows that often play late at night and also record shows that overlap with each other. I love being able to watch a show at my convenience and be able to fast forward through the commercials. I just purchased the Roamio pro and look forward to being able to stream my recorded shows onto my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Nice capacity, but UI is clunky
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine, but the user interface could really use some work. It's clunky and not as easy to use as UVerse by AT&T or even Xfinity by Comcrap, I mean Comcast. Plus, the sound cuts out on some shows... a very annoying issue that doesn't seem to have a solution according to everything I've found on the subject.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dieterle

customer_reviews.title: TiVo
customer_reviews.text: TiVo is the most amazing device you will ever try. It will record up to six programs at once, hours of storage. Plus an updated guide. They make suggestions for shows you might like, Have automatic link apps for Netflix, Hulu, and many others. The monthly fees are reasonable and worth every penny. If you have problems, call them up and talk to a real person, they will give you step by step instructions that turn out wonderfully for you. I absolutely love TiVo.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: I had to go to Comcast and TiVo is the Best way to watch digital Cable
customer_reviews.text: TiVo keeps making updates and keeps making suggestions for shows all the time. two months ago we got Quickmode on our Premier Series 4 MINIs. Today we got QuickMode on our Roamio Pro Series 5 ROAMIOs. I use it with Comcast. I have Dish Network Hoppers in our other house. since the new condo would not allow Dishes on the roof, I had to go to Comcast and TiVo is the Best way to watch digital Cable.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Zerdian

customer_reviews.title: Love My TiVo
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Roamio Pro and absolutely love it. It works beautifully with Verizon Fios. I used to have 3 DVRs (in different rooms) and would record different shows on each. Because of the limited HD recording capacity on each one, I was constantly doing housekeeping on each so as not to lose critical shows . This was especially true when away from home; vacations, etc. That was a huge hassle. With the Pros 450 hours HD capacity, no more housekeeping and my TV viewing life has improved considerably. Can't recommend TiVo enough. What are you waiting for??
customer_reviews.author: T. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love TIVO - hate Comcast
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but lessens the amount I pay Comcast. Has many advantages over Comcast recorder including transportability if I change service. Also, you can request a recording of a specific movie or actor and the service will continually look/wait for the broadcast and record it then. For example, I wanted City Slickers and it searched and found it on my channels 6 months later and recorded it. Best part is: I'm not paying Comcast.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Best cable recorder!
customer_reviews.text: This recorder is fabulous and so is the app. It is easy to schedule recordings and it holds a zillion. Using the app you can schedule recordings over the internet from a different location. Fantastic for scheduling at a distant vacation home!. The remote is hand friendly and absolutely super for watching a football game without ads and commentaries. Price with their service is high, but I think worth it. It beats a cable recorder hands down. Highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: responsive UI, ample storage and 6 tuners.
customer_reviews.text: Install seemed way more complex than necessary. I was using Xfinity so had to get cablecard. Moca setup was finicky. Ended up needing to set static IP's and disable firewall on router. This took me over 8 hours. I still have an issue... xfinity on-demand works fine on Rovio Pro but doesn't appear on Mini. But the service itself is awesome. RF remote is very responsive. User Interface is great (bit too cluttered though). Overall, very happy with Tivo and worth the headache of installation.
customer_reviews.author: David Giacomini

customer_reviews.title: Long-time TiVo owner loving the Roamio Pro HD!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is totally awesome! I owned the first model of TiVo, from Sony, and have upgraded every few years since then. This latest model provides a smooth experience across multiple content types, is easier to use for recorded content than the older TiVos (even the Series 3), and is reasonably well integrated for streaming content. I could imagine a somewhat smoother form of integration, but given that each player has to be an app, the degree of integration achieved is probably about the best that could be hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Much faster menus; better integration with Netflix and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Some prior Tivos I've owned were painfully slow at times when cycling through menu options, but this version is much faster and offers up to 6 channels of recordings. Options for watching sports, Netflix, and Amazon Prime Videos work seamlessly. I like the option of "What's on Now" highlighting current televised sports. Now if Tivo would figure out a way to record all of my favorite college sports games just by selecting the school that would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DSE

customer_reviews.title: Glad to be back.
customer_reviews.text: Was on Direct TV without TIVO for a couple of years. Really glad to be back. Things have actually gotten better. I have the Roamio Pro and 5 minis. The thing I missed the most was the instant response, especially when fast forwarding. The search searches everywhere, and the new SKIP is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cort

customer_reviews.title: Love our Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Our first Tivo and we love it. Dumped Dish Network after 18 years and went to cable. Did not want the Cisco DVR that Cox provided (and the extra monthly costs for each). Went with a Tivo instead and we could not be happier. Also bought 3 Tivo Mini to go with it. It took Cox a while to get the Tuning Adapter to work (required since Cox uses SDV to squeeze more into the bandwidth (bleh) but it is now working with the cable card installed in the Tivo.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love TiVo
customer_reviews.text: TiVo is awesome and the hardware is superior to what cable companies provide. They do lack when it comes to out-of-home streaming though. This is where my SlingBox comes in handy. Update: TiVo added streaming ability within the last couple of years. In home or remote.
customer_reviews.author: blucat

customer_reviews.title: works excellent. Now I have to learn all the works
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 1 1/2 days. I was surprised it shipped so fat. Have it hooked up to my Tv., works excellent. Now I have to learn all the works. I had a TIVO for approximately 5 years. Would not work with the new set-up from cable co. That is why I bought the most expensive one. I didn't want any programs deleted, plus this one says it will record Multiple programs at one time. So far, I haven't found that many to record at once.
customer_reviews.author: Celmo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality, ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a Beyond TV setup but I had to look at something new when my cable provider changed to all digital in place of analog. I picked the Roamio Pro because of it's large recording capacity and 6 digital tuners. My first unit had problems within the first couple days. After working with Tivo support the decision to replace the unit was quickly reached and Amazon came through with their usual great service. Since then there has been nothing but smiles. I love my Tivo!
customer_reviews.author: Mark O. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my TiVO Roamio Pro (and Minis)!
customer_reviews.text: This device is the closest thing to all in one I have found. I have my live sports via FiOS, my favorite shows via Netflix and Amazon, and my Movies from all of the above mentioned services, and it all shows up in one location, my OnePass! My only regret is that I waited this long to send back my cable boxes for my new TiVO boxes (I also have 2 Minis which work far better than the cable company's version of the same).
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: I have upgraded my aging PC with Ceton Tuner that I have been using as a DVR to the Tivo Roamio Pro. I must say that I was a little worried at first that we wouldn't like it, however it has proven to be worthy. Very nice picture, easy to use, nice netflix integration, nice hulu integration and others. Love the fact that we also have a Tivo Mini in the bedroom to stream recorded shows etc. too.
customer_reviews.author: cpubradley

customer_reviews.title: Roamio Crashed after less that 1 year and a half
customer_reviews.text: I bought my TIVO Roamio on March 18, 2015. Today August 17, 2016 it stopped working and will not boot up.When it worked it was great but only working a year and five months is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Roamio Pro
customer_reviews.text: I now have the ability to completely control my viewing pleasures - all with one device. I have the capacity to record a particular recurring event, and don't need to concern myself with my cable supplier's limited storage. The expandability TiVo provides allows that viewing experience in other rooms as well. I started with the Roamio Pro and one TiVo mini. So pleased, that I've ordered another TiVo mini to continue my expansion. Almost forgot... I can stream live video on my iPad, anywhere there's a WiFi connection with my TiVo app!
customer_reviews.author: Norcal Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great features, need some polish here and there
customer_reviews.text: I got back to TiVo after a few years and there are definitely great improvements, including the bigger hard drive and iOS/Android streaming. I was shocked though when during changing some settings I got dropped back to some menus with what looked like 480i resolution tops, just like TiVo used to look like 10 years ago. This is pretty sloppy and should be addressed to provide a great end-to-end experience. Overall, I'm happy I got back...
customer_reviews.author: Nindigully

customer_reviews.title: I own 5 that should say enough about my intense love of my TIVOs!!! ðY~aeðY~ae
customer_reviews.text: I started w my first 'baby' TIVO about 5 years ago and have been adding ever since! I currently use the ROAMIO PRO as my primary, but there is a TIVO in everyone's room at this point including the guest room. I am in the process of upgrading my WiFi to a MOCA connection bc I need more signal. I LOVE my TIVOs & am a lifer at this point! I can't imagine not having them...NOTHING compares!
customer_reviews.author: SusiQ

customer_reviews.title: Super machine!
customer_reviews.text: If you've owned an older Tivo model, you are probably thinking "Why would I upgrade to a Roamio Pro?" A number of features including 6 tuners (record 6 shows at once), built in Streaming to other devices in and out of your home, a faster and more responsive interface, and the ability to save money by eliminating the use of extra cable cards and lower electricity consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving it 5 stars even though I'm having problems ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 5 stars even though I'm having problems with it. At first I thought it was a cable card problem but it turned out to be the unit itself I was losing some channels. Cable vision made many attempts to fix it but it seams to be the unit itself Tivo is sending me a new unit I will add to this if this does or does not fix the problem
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Great DVR!
customer_reviews.text: I've had TiVos for more than half a decade now, and I love the TiVo Roamio Pro, especially combined with a TiVo Mini. The Roamio Pro records six shows at once and can stream them over the household network to other devices, including the Mini. So the big box can live in the media closet and the little box by the TV does the same job
customer_reviews.author: Sara Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from Verizon in that I own my boxes and can do with them what I want
customer_reviews.text: I own many boxes. I own them for I enjoy the freedom of choice it gives me in regard to what I want to keep and what I want to delete. I recently thought of retiring a couple of boxes and going with verizon. When I checked into it further I found I would lose a LOT of memory space and for the amount of money I already spend it just wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Tate

customer_reviews.title: New Users Are Enjoying the Tivo System
customer_reviews.text: Roamio and Mini have been installed only a few short weeks but we are already very pleased with the new way of watching television. The picture seems clearer and brighter than before. Using the system to record shows, to stream movies and to watch the vivid live programming is intuitive and enjoyable. Tivo Roamio and Mini allow us to accommodate our differing tastes in entertainment. We are loving Tivo already and as we learn more from the excellent tips and tutorials, our enjoyment is sure to grow. TiVo TCD840300 Roamio Pro HD DVR was purchased through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: H. G. Hice

customer_reviews.title: I am a die-hard TiVo fan but this unit did ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a die-hard TiVo fan but this unit did not work. I tried to get it to go past the welcome screen to no avail. TiVo customer service told me to return it. My last TiVo was killed in transit in a move but I will be back someday.
customer_reviews.author: Lise McClendon

customer_reviews.title: I had a terrible time during the setup but once the TiVo tech ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible time during the setup but once the TiVo tech explained why I needed a Moca bridge for my router everything fell into place. Also the Moca bridge purchase was cheaper at the TiVo store than at Amazon for the same brand. I am really enjoying the greater capabilities with the Roamio Pro compared with my Comcast X1 platform - especially the cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: Bob-Tax Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easiest setup yet - great features!
customer_reviews.text: So simple to set up. We even did the CableCard ourselves. And after the issues with the wireless adapter on our Premiere, wireless setup was a snap. With 6 shows at once, conflicts are a thing of the past. The wireless transfer was also easy to set up and adds a lot of convenience. No doubt in my mind that this is the best TiVo ever!
customer_reviews.author: David Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great in many ways
customer_reviews.text: Great in many ways, but the iPad app doesn't handle interruptions well, and it took a LOT to get it working with Cox: hours of support. My primary reason for going with TiVo was the ability to watch content anywhere. Well, you can't do that with most premium content. If I were to start over, I'd probably go wit the regular Cox solution.
customer_reviews.author: James Browning

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, TiVo To Go is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have had TiVo from the very first model, and almost every model since (and they keep getting better). I never watch Live TV (except certain event's like The Oscars or a really popular HBO show that I know people are going to talk about at work the next morning. I never have to worry about schedules on my Roamio Pro, with 6 tuners. Now there is no need to juggle my shows (I used to have to "prioritize" on two different TiVo's to make sure nothing got missed.) And, since I travel all the time TTG is a must. Even if a plane has WiFi it's too slow to stream movies and shows from the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: TiVo continues to amaze.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Series 3 HD/XL. I thought that -- other than the additional tuners -- it would be hard to improve upon the Series 3. Man, was I wrong! There are far too many improvements & expanded capabilities to even begin to count & everything works flawlessly. TiVo continues to amaze.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Ski Bum

customer_reviews.title: Cable has their DVR and the software was horrible. My wife wanted to go back to DTV ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had tivo in the past with Directv. I lost my faith in directv and we have canceled DTV and went with cable. Cable has their DVR and the software was horrible. My wife wanted to go back to DTV and i said lets give TiVo Roamio Plus a shot. WE LOVE IT AND WILL NEVER GO BACK! The new skip feature is awesome and having Netflix Amazon Prime Hulu and HBO integrated is SO FREAKING AWESOME!!! I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stuto

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: I had some "fun" experiences getting my Roamio Pro to use all 6 tuners. I got the cable card set up (first one worked), but only received programming on 2 of the 6 tuners. After a couple of visits to Tivo support (phone and online) and a LOT of searching online I discovered that to get all 6 tuners to work required just one thing. TURN OFF the tuning adapter and Tivo (I unplugged both of them) then waited a couple of minutes and turned on the tuning adapter. Waited until it was on, then I turned on the Tivo. VOILA, 6 working tuners. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: D Clark

customer_reviews.title: Had many TiVos since Series 1 in late 90s - No competition!
customer_reviews.text: Such an avid TiVo customer - we were in a 2005 TiVo infomercial. No other DVR is as intuitive and easy to use. These guys set the standard and others don't come close to competing. TiVo leadership needs to be less conservative when dealing with new media.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Because it's not a Comcast (Motorola) DVR!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Series 2 TiVo DVR years ago and while I loved the platform, downloading of the information via telephone line was just too much of a hassle. But I'm back! The Roamio Pro combines all of the functions I love (recording/Netflix streaming/iPad streaming) and the Mini is an added bonus. I purchased the Pro because I didn't want to worry about deleting (or losing programs like with the Comcast DVR) and even with a number of HD recordings I'm only at 11% of capacity! And of course the ease of use via the TiVo platform is just as easy and visually pleasing as ever. TiVo hit a home run with the Roamio Pro.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. CRAIG

customer_reviews.title: GET A TIVO
customer_reviews.text: I love my TiVo Roamio Pro. It's better than the X-1 Platform from Xfinity/Comcast. I really like the 6 tuners. I've got 1.5 gigs on the harddrive that is HD programing. I do wish that they would make a remote that uses your voice to program or uses the remote functions.
customer_reviews.author: Tampabluesboy

customer_reviews.title: Tivo has always been the best cable box
customer_reviews.text: I have owned used a tivo for my set top box since 2004. The dual tuner series 2 was a work horse. The first HD tivo was a huge leap forward now the Romio is amazing. It provides a network hub of entertainment and is easy to recommend with the tivo minis completing the picture. The only suggestion is to wire the house for cat5 ethernet and everything hums without problems.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE TIVO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love TIVO. Got rid of my cable company cable box, and have not regretted it one bit. I can skip commercials, store tons of movies and record 6 shows at once instead of 2 with my old box. And my adding 2 minis I have extended my viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: wmbowles

customer_reviews.title: I love the Tivo Romio
customer_reviews.text: I love the Tivo Romio. By using this in conjunction with a Tivo Mini, I saved myself an expense every month by having two separate digital converters from my cable company. This Tivo has six tuners on it, and works great in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Electronic Marvel
customer_reviews.text: I have used my new TiVo Roamio Pro for just a little over a week now and I am absolutely amazed as to how great this DVR is. The only regret I have about my TiVo is that I wish I had bought years ago. The tech support is some of the best that I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: David Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to create a OnePass that allows me ...
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to create a OnePass that allows me to watch the show not only on my current tv channels but also on my favorite streaming services.. Also the interface that Tivo created greatly outshines anything that the cable companies have conjured up. I love the Thumbs up and Thumbs Downs button on my remote and Tivo Suggestions always help me find something new to watch =)
customer_reviews.author: Steve, Pam, Or Joe Antonacci

customer_reviews.title: Set up, a unmitigated nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: What a complete nightmare the setup was - the Xfinity/Comcast part was just about three full days of my life. Tivo needs to sell the solution COMPLETE and ready to go. Take responsibility guys.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Interface and Recording Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased but had to buy a separate Kindle Box to get Amazon Prime Instant Video material that is free there but costs on Tivo. I had trouble with channels at first but Verizon is catching up or Tivo is. The kids love Tivo. Overall, this was a good, cutting edge move.
customer_reviews.author: ArchitectPilot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love our TIVO and the Roamio is great. We have had one or another type since the beginning of TIVO. This one had lots of space for every show you'll need. The other we have to have some in the bedroom and some in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Texasbelle

customer_reviews.title: No longer have to rent boxes from Cable Company, and its awesome, way better than X1 from comcast.
customer_reviews.text: Comcast wanted to charge me $50 a month to rent their equipment, and their X1 DVR was not good. So I purchased Tivo, worth every penny, no longer renting from Comcast. Once you watch Tivo with Tivo, you cant go back to watching Tivo without Tivo.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tivo at its best...
customer_reviews.text: The Roamio Pro is awesome - snappy interface, huge hard drive, 6 tuners, great interaction with ipad/iphone, and smart interface. I've been using Tivo since the beginning, and this is the first box that I can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: Rich J. Cornia

customer_reviews.title: Good features
customer_reviews.text: Just getting used to having my TiVo Pro as of today March 29, 2015. Set up requires you to read the set up manual carefully, although I went online to get information about set up before my purchase, I still found it sometimes confusing. I find explanations on TiVo Central are also confusing or lacking a clear explanation on how to use TiVo features. I hope my experience with my Roamio Pro are satisfying as I get used to this TiVo. I haven't had this long enough and the price made me give this 4 out 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Weaver

customer_reviews.title: New TiVo
customer_reviews.text: Our cable company upgraded its system which made our old Series 2DT obsolete. We decided to go with this model. Once we jumped all the hurdles in getting it set up, we are absolutely delighted with it. We are still discovering all the things this model can do.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmarolls

customer_reviews.title: Amazing DVR!
customer_reviews.text: Years ahead of the hopper with its record "6" more like 2, Directv and it's sluggish genie, Comcast and it's x1. The iPad app is AMAZING!!!! Blows the other providers apps away! I was hesitant due to cost but I would do it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: necrackolytez

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use - Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The Roamio Pro is the first model of Tivo that I have truely loved. I have owned many Tivo boxes throughout the years and the Roamio is just so much faster than all of them. Really the experience is finally waiting on you instead of the other way around. Keep up the good work Tivo.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Patton

customer_reviews.title: FAR FAR SUPERIOR to anything else out!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Comcast DVR for 4 years and have been looking for something different, something that I could own. I was just sick of renting equipment. Did a little research and found the TIVO Roamio. Let me tell you set up was easy, I got a cablecard from Comcast popped it in and ran through on screen setup it only took an hour. Now I have access to Amazon Prime Content, XFINITY ONDEMAND, NETFLIX, and Yahoo Screening! So I can watch COMMUNITY again! Recording is top notch, the guide is excellent, and the interface is easy to use and intuitive. BUY THIS! YOU WON'T BE DISSAPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: dan demonch

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product
customer_reviews.text: Besides some installation issues which were cable co related, the TIVO tech support was great and helpful. With all issues now resolved, I'm looking forward to many years of the TIVO experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shaw

customer_reviews.title: All in one!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this thing. It's great. Everything on your tv is accessible from it. Regular cable.. ...plus push one quick button to get to Roku....Netflix. ...hulu....and Youtube etc.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down, TiVo Romeo Pro is the best there is!
customer_reviews.text: Satellite and cable tv, beware...TiVo is back and has once again taken the DVR experience to the next level. Built in wifi...nice (and about time), 750 hours of TV...impressive. But what truly sets this apart from the standard box you get from you cable or satellite company is the speed. When you select a program, there is no delay. Oh and did I mention the streaming? Not only on your home network, but also when you are away from home, as long as you are in wifi, you can stream whatever is on your TiVo direct to your iPad or iPhone...now that is impressive!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I had a Verizon 2 tuner DRV, loved it - but not enough memory. Moved up to a Moxi 3 tuner DVR with streaming. It was bigger and better but it died, and Moxi went out of business. Then I got a Romio Pro, with 6 tuners, streaming and added an external drive...then I got a 2nd one. This is a wonderful system, and it's reliable!
customer_reviews.author: David C. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Roamio Pro
customer_reviews.text: My family is new to Tivo and we love it. We have one Roamio and three minis for the entire family. It has worked flawlessly since December, 2014. We particularly love the Onepass options. We hope as time goes by that more apps will be offered, such as HBOGO, but even without it, Tivo is a great investment in entertainment. The remote control is another matter. It's features are fine, but backlighting would be nice. It needing a direct line to the box is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Metler

customer_reviews.title: Great DVR system TiVo Roamoio Pro HD Digital recorder & streaming media player!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Roamio now that we have our speakers installed and can get around the remote. Definitely a learning curve but it is so nice to be able to record multiple shows and have them available to watch when we want. And on ANY of our TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Much better tha Mediacom equipment.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a dvr that would record what we wanted, when we wanted. We were so tired of missed recordings by our Mediacom issued equipment. However, the time on the guide is off by a couple minutes, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Buttram

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. /
customer_reviews.text: Using this with a cablecard and tuning adapter. Has greater capacity than the DVR I got from my cable company. Can record more programs simultaneously than the cable company DVR. Very happy./
customer_reviews.author: Norm B

customer_reviews.title: Such a MARVELOUS device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a marvelous device. It is the best DVR i've ever owned, BY FAR. The user interface is simple and user friendly. I can always depend on this DVR for my entertainment needs!
customer_reviews.author: Codey Carns

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome, and puts the competitors to shame!
customer_reviews.text: Tivo DVR's are awesome and its hard to quantify why because they make the experience so intuitive and easy that you don't really have to think about what they got right and what they got wrong, it's just all great! And easy for less tech savvy people to pick up my 70 yr old Mom picked up her's and started using it right away with very little learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Simi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic DVR!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Roamio Pro is a beast of a DVR. Have this as the main hub with a TiVo Mini connecting to it with the future expansion plan of adding two more Minis. Absolutely the best DVR I have ever owned and with it's ability to record 6 shows at once and run Netflix and Amazon it does almost everything except connect to my iTunes!
customer_reviews.author: Kawika 808

customer_reviews.title: Best DVR around.
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time TiVo user. This was a recent upgrade for me. Very surprised to find that the Roamio sent to me by Amazon included 1 year of service. Best deal ever.
customer_reviews.author: BackupGeek

customer_reviews.title: Really complicated to install - too complicated. But working ...
customer_reviews.text: Really complicated to install - too complicated. But working well except it has to be installed very close to the wifi which isn't always practical.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: If you watch TV, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Roamio Pro works flawlessly with cable card...gets every channel offered by provider. Love the explore function for movie cast and crew just wish the standard remote that comes with the unit was illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Brescia

customer_reviews.title: Ideal interface, absolute delight to use, always reliable -- The uber "Apple" of DVRs!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned more than five different TiVo's over the last dozen, or so, years (and have caused over 11 other TiVo units to be purchased by friends). Each has been the best in its category, yet each new TiVo model has significantly bested the previous model. Competitors are way distant in TiVo's rear view mirror. All this has allowed me to enjoy films and other video programming in a way that I could not easily do without - with efficiency, elegance and pure enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: acm

customer_reviews.title: streaming to mini tivos is good; tivo should improve reliability of streaming to
customer_reviews.text: i own two of these; streaming from one of my tivos to ios is buggy (has been for >6 months); streaming to mini tivos is good; tivo should improve reliability of streaming to ipads
customer_reviews.author: M A Zonin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, getting it to work with cable provider not so much
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. If I were to factor in getting this device to work with Comcast, this would be a two star review. Won't ding Tivo for Comcast's horrific customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Roamio Pro HD DVR
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Tivo 2 for 8 years but because lately I needed an HD box to be able to view programs and my cable company decided that I could only tape one program and only keep it one week, I decided to upgrade. I love the fact that with the Roamio I tricked the cable company and can again record several programs at a time and watch another one. In a very short time I got used to handling the remote and navigating the menu. I am extremely happy with the Tivo Roamio.
customer_reviews.author: Frau Hopps

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improves my Cable TV viewing experience!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I get the most from my Cable TV connection. Easier to find and record the programing I want and never seem to run out of space. The TiVo Mini is a great add on that allowed me to connect my other TV.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, awesome, awesome
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long? If you don't have a dev please do yourself a favor and get one of these, they will free up time and make TV enjoyable again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better then a regular cable box
customer_reviews.text: Wish I got this years ago. I have owned this now for 3 months. So much better then a regular cable box. Wife likes all the apps easier to get to as well. Just hope one day tivo will go wireless with the minis for cable!
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Roamio Pro + Mini(s) is the way to go for anyone with a Cable DVR
customer_reviews.text: TiVo owner pushing 13 years. Still the best way to watch for the User Interface, and the Roamio Pro I've had for almost a year is much faster and enjoyable to use than the Premiere line. The new Skip feature is the best new add in a long time. Nicely integrating the streaming services now, and the whole house approach with the Mini leaves any other DVR in the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Provides an eligant user interface, and a reliable top shelf multimedia entertainment system.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned numerous Tivo devices starting in 2003. I tried the cable company box for a year back in 2005 when Tivo did not support HD content. While the cable box technically worked and was cheaper, the Tivo experience is a vast improvement. With the new addition of Android streaming to Roamio all my mobile devices are now effective TV platforms. I love my Tivo, it is an essential component of my entertainment system.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had Tivo systems for many years and now appreciate the fact that the Roamio can record up to 6 shows at a time and has a large storage capacity. I especially like the Season Pass capability the the ease of operation and setup.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilson

customer_reviews.title: TiVo is the best DVR period
customer_reviews.text: I have been using various DVR's since they were created. The TiVo Roamio Pro is hands-down the best one yet. Read the specs and compare.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The speed, it operates at the speed that I expect from today's tech.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried multiple TV services and my number one complaint was the slowness/sluggishness of the equipment, especially the satellite TV's. With TiVo that is gone. I have 1 DVR and 7 mini's and everyone one of them is very responsive and so easy to operate. My biggest regret is that it took me so long to find TiVo and give them a chance. I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Christoph A. Jakan

customer_reviews.title: Fast and functional
customer_reviews.text: I used to deal with Comcast and the old slow gear, the Roamio Pro is really fast, I can also access Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, and now Vudu! it's great on its own. Couple it with the mobile access and the Minis....it's a whole new level of unified entertainment throughout our home. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Good DVR, fast, good interface, lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade from a TiVo HD (series 3). - Favorite features: 6 tuners (although I doubt I would ever need more than 3-4, but 2 I had a few conflicts) - Interface is nice, functional and clean (and it is way better than the Comcast DVRs I have used). It is also extremely responsive - I like the Beam/DirectDial capability some vendors (Netflix and Youtube so far) included. Doubt Apple will add this, but it is nice. - Would love better iOS integration (i.e. Airplay capabilities) - Can't wait for remote viewing instead of just through local network
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: TiVo started the DVR trend, and has made watching your favorite shows at any time so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: We got a TiVo when the first model was released and I can recall how amazed we all were at how much easier it made watching our favorite shows! Now that TiVo's can work with any cable provider and tune into HD feeds, TiVo is once again the best DVR service out there!
customer_reviews.author: RJYGN

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my TiVo
customer_reviews.text: This tivo is the greatest thing ever invented ! I'll recommend tivo roamio to all my friends and family roamio pro nice features easy to use never misses a recording very dependable go out and buy one today
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Just Upgrated
customer_reviews.text: Just recently upgraded my cable dvr to the new TiVo roamio pro. I can't believe how much more I can record on this dvr compared to my old cable box. Recording six programs compared to only 2 that charter gave me. It was a shame I waited this long to upgrade. I have it connected to my TiVo mini in my bedroom. Great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I love making the most of my free time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Tivo in 1999 as a directTivo with direct TV, I've always loved that Tivo with season pass and recommendations allows me to sit down to watch TV and watch exactly what I want regardless of what's on TV. I can enjoy my life and not schedule according to prime time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tillinghast

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: works well, support is slow, unable to count on what they say
customer_reviews.author: michael w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience. Never a problem. Tons of features. Goodbye rental fees.
customer_reviews.text: Just simply a great experience. Never a problem, always get my shows, full of features! Also, don't have to fork over rental fees to the Cable company!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Agostoni

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so awesome and has solved so so many of my problems
customer_reviews.text: If you're hesitating buying Tivo, don't. This thing is so awesome and has solved so so many of my problems.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish i would have had this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive. Awesome menu system. And Tivo support is GOOOOOOOOOOD People!!!! Luv it! Never going back to rinky dinky cable boxes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy change over from the cable company product, great service from TIVO and right on time delivery from AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Janice H

customer_reviews.title: It allows me to watch for my favorite actors in a show and auto-records them.
customer_reviews.text: I use TiVO instead of DVRs because they can watch for actors in addition to named shows. That way I can follow my favorite performers.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

product_meta.title: TiVo Roamio Pro 3 TB DVR (Old Version) - Digital Video Recorder and Streaming Media Player
product_meta.description: Now HD Cable service can take advantage of the advanced features of the world's best DVR, at an unprecedented TiVo price. Just insert a CableCARD into TiVo Roamio Pro and within minutes you'll record and control all your favorite shows, look ahead with a two–week program guide, and supplement your channel lineup with streaming apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu Plus, YouTube and more. It all comes together in the single best entertainment solution for television enthusiasts.
feature_bullets: Up to 450 HD / 3000 SD hours recording capacity (3TB). Works with digital cable or Verizon FIOS
Access TV and streaming content from Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu Plus, VUDU and more without switching inputs
Requires subscription to the TiVo service – as low as $12.50/month with annual plan
Note - This product has a cablecard slot but does not include a cable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,059 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
